string-array.name: tips_lab
string-array.item: "I'm a Corgi, I am hungry if you don't feed me."
"I can be feed three times a day."
"Your pet will be given 3 pieces of meat when you register this app"
"Every 1000 steps you walk, you will win a piece of meat for me."
"If I am starving, I cannot do anything."
"You can increase my knowledge through reading our tips."
"You can make me happy through listen to music."
"You can play with me by touching me."
